campaignevents-error-invalid-status: Kyerɛ sɛ ɔkra no abue anaa wɔatwa mu."
campaignevents-error-invalid-timezone: Bɔ bere soronko a ɛyɛ papa."
campaignevents-error-invalid-start: "Ɛnyɛ bere a ɛfata sɛ ɔkra no fi ase."
campaignevents-error-start-past: "Bɔ berɛ a ɛda akyiri a ɔkra no bɛfi ase."
campaignevents-error-invalid-end: "Ɛnyɛ bere a ɛfata sɛ ɔkra no bɛwie."

campaignevents-error-no-meeting-type: Paw ɔkra nhyiam ho nsɛm atɔso baako anaa ɛboro so."

campaignevents-error-meeting-url-not-onl: Sɛ ɛyɛ ɔnlaen ɛneɛ, na ɛnnyɛ ɛberɛ a wobɛka nhyiam no URL ho.
campaignevents-error-countryoraddress-no: Sɛ ɛnyɛ wim hyia (face-to-face) a, ɛnsɛ sɛ wobɔ nhyiam ɔman ne adres no ho nsɛm.
campaignevents-error-invalid-address: Fa intanɛt so nkrata a edi mu no hyɛ mu.
campaignevents-error-invalid-question-na: Wɔngye nsɛmmisa a edidi so yi ntum yɛ: $1
campaignevents-edit-form-details-subtitl: Ma nsɛm a ɛfa dwumadi a worehyehyɛ no ho
campaignevents-edit-field-page-help: Dwumadi kratafa biara wɔ nsɛm a ɛfa wo dwumadie no ho.Obiara a ɔyɛ bi bɛtumi atwerɛ ne din wɔ dwumadie kratafa no hɔ.
campaignevents-edit-field-organizers-hel: Fa akontaabu din a ɛyɛ wɔfoɔ foforɔ ho na ma wɔnya ho kwan sɛ wɔbɛhwɛ saa bɔne no.
campaignevents-edit-field-organizers-cre: Ɛno ne nea ɔbɔɔ bɔne no, wɔfoɔ foforɔ ntumi mmpeprɛ saa ɔde no.
campaignevents-edit-field-organizers-use: Saa {{GENDER:$1|yɛfoɔ}} yi nni ho kwan sɛ ɔbɛbɔ bɔne.
campaignevents-edit-field-tracking-tools: Awofo din a wɔabɛtɛw akyerɛw ho wɔ mankɛsɛm bɛkɔ Dashboard no ho automatisch. Ɔtɛkyerɛma yi bɛboa wo ama wobehu abatoɔfo mmoa na wopima ɔyare a wo nkɔmmɔbea no yɛ. [https://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Programs_%26_Events_Dashboard Sua pii].
Fa Programs & Events Dashboard URL no kɔ mu ma wo bɔne no.
campaignevents-edit-field-chat-url-help: Sɛ wowɔ wɛb nkɔmmɔbɔ kɔnkɔnkɔn ama bɔne yi afa no ho a, wobetumi de frɛ link no bɛha. Wɔn a wɔakyerɛw wɔn ho akɔ so bɛtumi ahu frɛ link no.
campaignevents-edit-form-questions-label: Nsɛmmisa ɛma wɔn a wɔka ho
campaignevents-edit-form-questions-expla: Wɔ bɔne no mu, wobetumi ahu mmuae a wɔn a wɔka ho de mae ama nsɛmma a ɛnyɛ wɔn ankasa nsɛm a wɔde hu wɔn (PII). Bere a bɔne no awie a, mmuae no bɛyɛ hɔ, nanso ɛbɛyɛ dodoɔ pɛ, na wɔbɛpopa wɔn ankasa mmuae.
campaignevents-edit-form-notice: Wɔbɛboaboa akontaabu din nkutoo ano fi wɔn a wɔbɛka ho bere a wɔbɛyɛ kyerɛwtohɔ. [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:Extension:CampaignEvents/Registration Fa ho nsɛm pii].
campaignevents-edit-invalid-id: Fa dwumadie ahyɛnsode a edi mu to dwa.
campaignevents-edit-event-notfound: "Ensɛ wɔ ho biara a ɛwɔ saa ID yi."
campaignevents-edit-need-central-account: "Wɔhiahia wo sɛ w’anya akontaabu foforɔ a ɛbɔ hye den na wobetumi ama anaasɛ asesa nsɛmma."
campaignevents-edit-organizers-not-allow: "$2 {{PLURAL:$1|nni|nnim}} ho kwan a ɛhia sɛ ɔyɛ {{PLURAL:$1|nea ɔto toa no|wɔn a wɔto toa no}}."
campaignevents-edit-no-organizers: "Nsɛmma bɛhia ɔpanyin baako atɔ so. Mepa wo kyɛw, fa ɔpanyin ka ho anaasɛ popa nsɛmma no sɛ ɛnyɛ hia bio."
campaignevents-edit-removed-creator: "Wo ntumi nnyi $1, efisɛ {{GENDER:$1|saa ɔdeyɛfo yi}} na ɔbɔɔ nsɛmma no."
campaignevents-edit-no-creator: "Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wobue nsɛmma a edi kan a, ɛsɛ sɛ wode wo ho ka ho sɛ ɔpanyin."
campaignevents-edit-too-many-organizers: "Wo ntumi nnya ɔpanyin dodow a ɛboro $1 {{PLURAL:$1|ɔpanyin|ɔpanyinfo}}."
campaignevents-edit-organizer-need-centr: "Wɔn a ɛda so yi {{PLURAL:$1|ɔdeyɛfo no nni|ɔdeyɛfo no nnim}} akontaabu foforɔ na wɔn ntumi nnya sɛ {{PLURAL:$1|ɔpanyin|ɔpanyinfo}}: $2."
campaignevents-error-page-already-regist: Ɛda ho no nsɛmma no wɔ akyɛde a wɔde ato ho dada."
Wo ntumi nwie adwuma no efisɛ nsɛmma no atɔ ho fi nsɛmma no ho."
campaignevents-edit-not-allowed-registra: "Woennye ho kwan sɛ wopɛ sɛ wosesa nsɛmma yi."
campaignevents-enable-registration-not-a: "Woennye ho kwan sɛ wopɛ sɛ wode nsɛmma bu event no ho."
campaignevents-register-error-event-not-: Dwumadie biara nni hɔ a ɛwɔ saa ID yi.

canceleventregistration: Twa wo dintwerɛ ma dwumadi bi

campaignevents-register-not-allowed: Wonni ho kwan sɛ wobɛtumi atwerɛ wodin ama dwumadi ahodoɔ yi.

campaignevents-edit-registration-deleted: Wɔapopa saa dwumadi yi ho dintwerɛ.

campaignevents-eventpage-enableheader-ev: Dɔkɔdɔkɔ krataa: Ma nsɛmfua ho yɛ a, na mmaabafo bɛtumi atɔ so wɔ krataa no so direktee.

campaignevents-event-details-register-pr: Ɛsɛ sɛ woto so ansa na wuhu nsɛm yi.
campaignevents-event-details-no-organize: Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wotumi de krataa kɔma mmaabafo a, ɛsɛ sɛ wowɔ email address wɔ wo akawnt so. [[Special:ChangeEmail|Fa email ka ho]].

campaignevents-event-details-dates-label: Bere a ɛbɛhyɛ ne bere a ɛbɛto so
campaignevents-unregister-participants-p: Wɔnhyɛ wo kwan sɛ wopopa mmaabafo.
campaignevents-unregister-participants-r: Wɔntumi mpopɔ mmaabafo fi dɔkɔdɔkɔ yi mu efisɛ wɔatɔ so.
campaignevents-event-details-remove-part: Ɛyɛɛ sɛnea ɛda ho no, na ɛyɛ bɔne sɛ wokɔpɔpɔ {{PLURAL:$1|ɔbaafo|mmaabafo}} no.
campaignevents-event-details-organizers-: Ɛsɛ sɛ wo ma JavaScript ho tumi sɛnea wobɛtumi ahu nhyehyɛefo no nyinaa
campaignevents-tracking-tool-p&e-dashboa: Dwumadie ne akansie ahodoɔ a ɛda intanɛt so
campaignevents-tracking-tool-http-error: Mfomso bi a wonnim bae bere a na wɔrebɔ mmɔden sɛ wɔbɛyɛ w’akadeɛ ahodoɔ a wɔde di akyi ho adwuma no.
campaignevents-tracking-tool-wikiedu-con: Esan sɛ nhyehyɛe ho asɛm bi nti, wontumi mfa $1 nyɛ adwuma.
campaignevents-tracking-tool-wikiedu-not: Wɔn a wɔhyehyɛ saa dwumadie yi biara nni hɔ a wɔboa nhyehyɛeɛ $1.
campaignevents-tracking-tool-wikiedu-alr: Nhyehyɛeɛ $1 wɔ wɔn a wɔka ho dada enti wɔn ntumi nka dwumadie yi ho.
Nhyehyɛeɛ $1 ɛka dwumadie ho dada na ɛntumi nka foforo ho bio.
campaignevents-tracking-tool-wikiedu-not: Nhyehyɛeɛ $1 nka dwumadie yi ho enti ɛntumi nhyia.
campaignevents-userlink-suppressed-user: Wodin a wode di dwuma no yaka ahyɛ
campaignevents-registration-confirmation: Fɛw nsɛmfua ho: Kyerɛ wo din wɔ mmaabafo krataa a ɛda hɔ ma obiara. W’adwuma a wobɛyɛ wɔ dɔkɔdɔkɔ no mu betumi aka ho a ɔdeɛfoɔ bɛde akɔ [https://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Programs_%26_Events_Dashboard Programs & Events Dashboard] anaa akɔnnɔde foforɔ a wɔde boaboa nsɛnkanee ano mu.
echo-pref-tooltip-campaign-events-notifi: Ma menhu a wɔde Event Registration akɔnnɔde no rekyerɛ me bere a metɔ so wɔ dɔkɔdɔkɔ bi mu.
campaignevents-notification-registration: Kɔ $1 de bɛhyia mmaabafo foforo na wunya nkɔsoɔ fi ɔdeɛfoɔ no.
campaignevents-event-details-email-subje: Asɛm a ɛwɔ w'email krataa mu
campaignevents-event-details-email-messa: W'email krataa mu nkyerɛaseɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ ɛyɛ dodoɔ 10 nsɛm anaa ho.
campaignevents-email-select-participant-: Mepa wo kyɛw, paw mmerɛfo a wɔwɔ email a ɛyɛ nokware.
campaignevents-email-participants-missin: Ɛwɔ sɛ wopaw mmaabafo bi a wɔwɔ email address wɔ wɔn akawnt so, efisɛ mmaabafo a wɔnni email address no rentumi nnya w'email no. Wubetumi de krataa kɔma wɔn sɛ wopaw wɔn din na kɔ wɔn user talk krataa so.
campaignevents-register-questions-label-: Nsɛm yi bɛda ho ma dɔkɔdɔkɔ ɔdeɛfoɔ nko ara.
campaignevents-register-question-gender: Dɛn na ɛyɛ wo ho nsɛmfua a ɛfa wo nananom ho? (Nsu yɛ a ɛnyɛ pɛ)
campaignevents-register-question-gender-: Mepa wo kyɛw, menpɛ sɛ meka.
Nnipa ho nsɛmfua a ɛnni hɔ
campaignevents-register-question-age: Dɛn na wo mfe? (Nsu yɛ a ɛnyɛ pɛ)
campaignevents-register-question-age-opt: Wɔn a wɔnni mmoroo aduonu num
campaignevents-register-question-profess: Adwuma bɛn na wo yɛ? (ɛnyɛ ɔhyɛ)
Dwumadie a ɛfa nsɛm ho nimdefo
Tete nneɛma akoraeɛ anaa akorae ho nimdefoɔ
Adwuma ho nimdeɛ a wɔnfa nhwehwɛ mfasoɔ
campaignevents-register-question-confide: So w'ani gye ho sɛ wobɛboa Wikimedia dwumadie ahodoɔ a ɛfa saa dwumadie yi ho no? (ɔnyɛ nhyɛ)
Mewɔ suahunu bi, nanso menni akokoɔduro
Mewɔ suahunu kakra, na mewɔ akokoɔduro sɛ mɛtumi aboa, nanso mepɛ sɛ mesua pii ka ho
Mewɔ awerɛhyem sɛ mɛtumi aboa a minya mmoa biara .
campaignevents-register-question-affilia: Woyɛ ɔbaakofo wɔ Wikimedia ho nnamfo (chapters, user groups, thematic organizations) bi mu? (Nsu yɛ a ɛnyɛ pɛ)
campaignevents-register-question-confide: Nti wowɔ akokoɔduro sɛ wobɛboa Wikimedia dwumadie ahodoɔ a ɛfa saa dwumadie yi ho no?
campaignevents-register-question-affilia: Wo ka Wikimedia kuo bi ho (mfapem, nnipakuo, nnwumakuo a ɛfa nsɛm ho)?
campaignevents-register-question-confide: Nti wowɔ akokoɔduro sɛ wobɛboa Wikimedia dwumadie ahodoɔ a ɛfa saa dwumadie yi ho no?
campaignevents-register-question-affilia: Wo ka Wikimedia kuo bi ho (mfapem, nnipakuo, nnwumakuo a ɛfa nsɛm ho)?
campaignevents-register-answers-aggregat: Wo mmuae no aboa ano na wɔatɔ so sɛnea ɛda ho wɔ nsɛm fa data a wɔkora ho ho.
campaignevents-register-retention-title: Nsɛm fa data a wɔkora ho ho
campaignevents-register-retention-base: Wo mmuaeɛ no bɔaboa ano na ɛkyɛ 90 nna akyi no, anaa bere a ɛda no to ba no a ɛba kan no, na wɔpam no. Wubetumi asesa wo mmuaeɛ no da biara ansa na ɛreba saa bere no. Sɛ wɔpam a, ɛnntumi nsesa bio, ɛnntumi nso mmua bio, na ɛnntumi mfa bio.
campaignevents-register-retention-days: Bere a aka ansa na wɔbɔaboa wo mmuaeɛ ano na wɔpam no ne: $1 {{PLURAL:$1|da|nnawɔtwe}}.
campaignevents-register-retention-hours: Bere a aka ansa na wɔbɔaboa wo mmuaeɛ ano na wɔpam no ne: aka dɔnhwere 24 nketewa.
